titles.title: To increase the Government's share of development project costs at certain qualifying airports.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 12/19/2001--Introduced. Amends the Federal Transportation Code to increase the Federal Government's share of allowable costs of development projects approved after September 30, 2001, at certain qualifying airports with certain exceptions. Stipulates a maximum of 93.75 percent for the Federal Government's share of the cost of any project.
